entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Local amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 20.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming south 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 20. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
